outline.text: TRS Benefits Fuel Illinois’ Economy
SPRINGFIELD, IL-Benefits paid by the Teachers’ Retirement System of the State of Illinois
(TRS) are pumping billions of dollars into the Illinois economy each year and have created tens
of thousands of new jobs. That’s according to a study conducted by the $40 billion system, the
largest of the five state pension systems in Illinois.
